languages.text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.

traits.locale_text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, damage, blind, or grant foreboding.
Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.
Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.

languages.text: Касание варпа дает мутантам случайную мутацию каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Мутация может исцелять, наносить {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, накладывать ослепление или давать предчувствие.
languages.original_text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.

traits.locale_text: Касание варпа дает мутантам случайную мутацию каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Мутация может исцелять, наносить урон, накладывать ослепление или давать предчувствие.
Касание варпа дает мутантам случайную мутацию каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Мутация может исцелять, наносить урон, накладывать ослепление или давать предчувствие.

languages.text: 亚空间的碰触每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都会让所有变种人随机突变一次。这些变异可能会恢复生命值、造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}、导致致盲，或带来不祥的预兆。
languages.original_text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间的碰触每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}都会让所有变种人随机突变一次。这些变异可能会恢复生命值、造成伤害、导致致盲，或带来不祥的预兆。

languages.text: <歪み>に触れると、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに変異体にランダムな突然変異が与えられる。変異は回復したり、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けたり、盲目になったり、危険感知を得たりするだろう。
languages.original_text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.

traits.locale_text: <歪み>に触れると、{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに変異体にランダムな突然変異が与えられる。変異は回復したり、ダメージを受けたり、盲目になったり、危険感知を得たりする。

languages.text: El toque de la disformidad da a los mutantes una mutación aleatoria cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. La mutación puede curar, infligir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, cegar u otorgar una premonición.
languages.original_text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.

traits.locale_text: El toque de la disformidad da a los mutantes una mutación aleatoria cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. La mutación puede curar, herir, cegar u otorgar una premonición.

languages.text: Die Berührung des Warp gewährt Mutanten in jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eine zufällige Mutation. Die Mutation kann heilen, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursachen, blind machen oder eine Vorhersehung gewähren.
languages.original_text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.

traits.locale_text: Die Berührung des Warp gewährt Mutanten jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eine zufällige Mutation. Die Mutation kann heilen, schaden, blind machen oder eine Vorhersehung gewähren.

languages.text: Contact du Warp confère aux mutants une mutation aléatoire à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. La mutation peut soigner, infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, aveugler ou conférer l'effet Pressentiment.
languages.original_text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.

traits.locale_text: Contact du Warp confère aux mutants une mutation aléatoire à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. La mutation peut soigner, infliger des dégâts, aveugler ou conférer l'effet Pressentiment.

languages.text: Öteboyutun dokunuşu, mutantlarda her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} rastgele bir mutasyona sebep olur. Mutasyon iyileştireceği gibi {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} da verebilir, kör edebilir veya önsezi kazandırabilir.
languages.original_text: Touch of the warp grants mutants a random mutation every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The mutation may heal, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, blind, or grant foreboding.
